summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4514 for the improvement of the alley in block 17, Hill Tract Addition Supplemental Plat, being the alley between 14th Avenue South and 16th avenue South, between Jackson Street and Main Street; by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 52973, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
